description:
My goal is to help as many authors as possible to be successful with their ebooks, right out of the gate. Since self-publishing and enjoying continuous best-seller status on several books, I have noticed that there are common mistakes made by both new and established authors, and they can really hurt sales.

THERE IS NO NEED TO MAKE (COSTLY!) MISTAKES : This course teachs you how to . . . .

* HOW TO PUBLISH ON KINDLE …. quickly on Amazon KDP + gather pertinent pre-publishing information
* GET AN OVERVIEW …. of the eBook industry + what it means for your ePublishing future
* FOLLOW BEST PRACTICES …. to write ANYTHING, quickly + effectively
* LEARN HOW …. competitors can be your best friends (wink)
* CONDUCT IMPORTANT …. category, tag and keyword research + watch how I do it
* OPTIMIZE …. your title, book cover + book description + see effective examples
* FOLLOW STEPS …. to get your book converted to digital formats
* READ COMPELLING …. information on ISBN's + their importance
* TURN UP …. your Scam Metre to avoid publishing rip-offs
* CHANGE HATS …. often throughout the eBook cycle to keep sales going!
title: 12 (Fixable) Mistakes Authors Make That Hurt Sales
